pr_title: Added new object EnrichedHost and new method getEnrichedHosts

timeline.bodyText: Add information to javadoc, that empty list will return no attributes. In some specific cases we have exactly different behavior (where empty means all). Same for other layers (impl, api, rpc).
timeline.author: stavamichal
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -491,6 +491,18 @@
 	 */
 	List<Attribute> getAttributes(PerunSession sess, Host host) throws InternalErrorException;
 
+	/**
+	 * Get all attributes associated with the host which have name in list attrNames (empty and virtual too).
+	 *

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/perun-core/src/main/java/cz/metacentrum/perun/core/bl/AttributesManagerBl.java b/perun-core/src/main/java/cz/metacentrum/perun/core/bl/AttributesManagerBl.java
index bed4fa3c1..d42202598 100644
--- a/perun-core/src/main/java/cz/metacentrum/perun/core/bl/AttributesManagerBl.java
+++ b/perun-core/src/main/java/cz/metacentrum/perun/core/bl/AttributesManagerBl.java

@@ -489,13 +489,13 @@ public interface AttributesManagerBl {
 	 * @return list of attributes
 	 * @throws InternalErrorException if an exception raise in concrete implementation, the exception is wrapped in InternalErrorException
 	 */
-	List<Attribute> getAttributes(PerunSession sess, Host host) throws InternalErrorException;
+	List<Attribute> getAttributes(PerunSession sess, Host host);
 
 	/**
-	 * Get all attributes associated with the host which have name in list attrNames (empty and virtual too).
+	 * Get all attributes associated with the host which have name in list attrNames (empty and virtual too). Empty list attrNames will return no attributes.
 	 *
 	 * @param sess perun session
-	 * @param host host to get attributes from
+	 * @param host host to get attributes for
 	 * @param attrNames list of attributes' names
 	 * @return list of attributes
 	 *

timeline.bodyText: You are not checking rights to get hosts for facility. You need to check it there or call method from api to correctly check rights.
timeline.author: stavamichal

timeline.bodyText: This could lead to null pointer exception if no hosts is on facility.
timeline.author: stavamichal

timeline.bodyText: Probably missing privileged exception and testing of rights for a user.
timeline.author: stavamichal
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -276,6 +276,19 @@
 	 */
 	List<Host> getHosts(PerunSession sess, Facility facility) throws FacilityNotExistsException, InternalErrorException;
 
+	/**
+	 * Return all EnrichedHosts of given facility. That is host with attributes given by attrNames.
+	 *
+	 * @param sess perun session
+	 * @param facility facility
+	 * @param attrNames attribute names
+	 * @return list of enriched hosts
+	 *
+	 * @throws AttributeNotExistsException if some attribute does not exist
+	 * @throws FacilityNotExistsException if facility does not exist
+	 */
+	List<EnrichedHost> getEnrichedHosts(PerunSession sess, Facility facility, List<String> attrNames) throws AttributeNotExistsException, FacilityNotExistsException;

timeline.bodyText: We have discussed this with @stavamichal, and we don't want to compare enriched hosts based on their attributes. We want to say that two enriched hosts are equal if they represent the same host. There are specific scenarios where also comparing attributes could lead to some troubles.
timeline.author: Vojtech-Sassmann

timeline.bodyText: You have changed the logic. So now you need to check if there are expected attributes manually.
timeline.author: stavamichal

replies.bodyText: Yes, it should be fixed now as well.
replies.author: metodej

timeline.message:
Fixes based on review to tests

- fixed test to check attributes of enrichedHost

timeline.bodyText: We have recently agreed on removing the cache completely. So please, remove this code as well.
timeline.author: Vojtech-Sassmann

timeline.message:
Added getAttributes by names for host

- added method to get attributes selected by list of attribute names for host
- also added test for this method

Added new object EnrichedHost and new method getEnrichedHosts

- added new object EnrichedHost which contains host and its attributes
- added new method to FacilitiesManager getEnrichedHosts which returns all enrichedHosts from given facility (attributes in object are filtered by rights)
- also added test for this method

Fixes based on review

- fixed javadocs
- added rights to getHosts
- changed EnrichedHost.equals to compare only hosts

Fixes based on review to tests

- fixed test to check attributes of enrichedHost

Fixes based on review

- removed usage of attribute cache

Fixes based on review

- removed usage of attribute cache
